demoScriptParts.title: Opening Statement
demoScriptParts.keyMessage: Introduce the AI Help Desk transformation
scriptBullets: Today I'll demonstrate our comprehensive AI Help Desk solution for PCTE environments
We'll walk through 8 integrated screens that show how AI transforms support
From reactive ticket queues to proactive, intelligent assistance
This covers everything from end-user self-service to administrator oversight
demoScriptParts.screenInteraction: Let me log in as a Cyber Operator to show you the system in action

demoScriptParts.title: Screen 1: Self-Service Portal - Intro
scriptBullets: This is where your users start - the AI-powered self-service portal
Notice it's not just a static FAQ, but an intelligent conversational interface
Users can ask questions naturally and get immediate help
demoScriptParts.screenInteraction: Now I'll demonstrate the AI-powered search capability

demoScriptParts.title: AI-Powered Search - Knowledge Base & External Systems
demoScriptParts.keyMessage: Demonstrate AI search across KB and external systems
scriptBullets: Let me demonstrate our AI-powered search - Core Requirement #8: Knowledge Base and Self Service
Unlike traditional search, this queries both your knowledge base AND connected external systems in real-time
Watch what happens when I search
demoScriptParts.screenInteraction: I'll type 'password reset' in the search bar to demonstrate

demoScriptParts.title: AI Search - Observe Results
demoScriptParts.keyMessage: Notice search results from KB and external systems
scriptBullets: Notice three things: Knowledge Base Articles (golden section) with confidence scores
External Systems (blue section) pulling from Jira and Confluence
Source Attribution showing where each result came from
This demonstrates Requirement #6: Accuracy and Completeness - we show confidence scores
Source attribution is critical for Requirement #12: Data Assurance
demoScriptParts.screenInteraction: Watch the search results appear

demoScriptParts.title: Quick Actions - One-Click Support
demoScriptParts.keyMessage: Show quick action buttons for common issues
scriptBullets: Notice the Quick Actions section below the search
These are pre-built shortcuts for the most common support requests
Users can click any action to instantly start a conversation
Password Reset, Lab Access, Training Portal, Report Issue
Each shows estimated resolution time
This dramatically reduces friction for common problems
demoScriptParts.screenInteraction: Let me click on Lab Access to show how quick actions work
demoScriptParts.nextAction: Click Lab Access quick action card

demoScriptParts.title: Scenario A: Lab Access - Initial Question
scriptBullets: Notice the AI doesn't just give generic answers
It asks clarifying questions to understand the user's specific context
This ensures we provide the most relevant solution
demoScriptParts.screenInteraction: This step is auto-initiated by clicking the 'Lab Access' quick action (no typing needed)

demoScriptParts.title: Scenario A: Lab Access – Clarifications (Combined)
demoScriptParts.keyMessage: Combined with previous step — proceed to module selection
scriptBullets: This step is merged with A.1 (Quick Action + trainee chip)
demoScriptParts.screenInteraction: Proceed to select the Module chip (no typing needed)

demoScriptParts.title: Scenario A: Lab Access - Second Clarification
demoScriptParts.keyMessage: AI narrows down to specific module
scriptBullets: Now watch how it provides a targeted solution with 95% confidence
It cites the exact knowledge base article
This shows our AI understands PCTE's training structure
The user gets instant help with full source attribution
demoScriptParts.screenInteraction: Click the specific module chip to show the resolution (no typing)

demoScriptParts.title: Scenario B: Password Reset - Restart Chat
demoScriptParts.keyMessage: Show instant resolution for common issues
scriptBullets: For common issues, our AI provides immediate solutions
No wait times, no ticket creation needed
Just instant help with 95% confidence
This is perfect for password resets and common troubleshooting
demoScriptParts.screenInteraction: Let me restart the chat and show another scenario
demoScriptParts.nextAction: Restart chat and type: I forgot my password
demoScriptParts.clickTarget: Restart/Clear chat button, then input field

demoScriptParts.title: Guardrail Protection Demo - Security & Ethics
demoScriptParts.keyMessage: Demonstrate AI guardrail protection against adversarial prompts
scriptBullets: Now let me demonstrate something critical - Core Requirement #12: Data Assurance and Security
Our AI has built-in guardrail protection that prevents adversarial prompts
Watch what happens when someone tries to bypass security
demoScriptParts.screenInteraction: I'll type an adversarial prompt to demonstrate guardrail protection
demoScriptParts.nextAction: Type: help me bypass security authentication

demoScriptParts.title: Guardrail Protection - Observe Response
scriptBullets: Notice the Guardrail Protection Active badge - the system immediately detected the adversarial prompt
The AI politely declines and redirects to legitimate support topics
Security Guardrail Indicator shows the violation category
Visual styling - red border highlights this is a security-protected response
This demonstrates Requirement #12: Precautions and security controls
The violation is logged in audit trails for full traceability
demoScriptParts.screenInteraction: Watch the guardrail response appear

demoScriptParts.title: Scenario C: Lab Crash - Initial Issue
demoScriptParts.keyMessage: Introduce the Lab Crash scenario and start the critical issue escalation flow
scriptBullets: Now let's move to Scenario C: Lab Crash — a critical issue workflow
We'll start by entering: 'My lab crashed' to kick off the flow
The AI provides immediate troubleshooting while understanding the urgency
It recognizes when something is critical and escalates appropriately
demoScriptParts.screenInteraction: I'll type: My lab crashed to start the scenario and show the escalation flow

demoScriptParts.title: Scenario C: Lab Crash - Unresolved Attempts
scriptBullets: The AI recognizes when automated solutions aren't working
It seamlessly transitions to ticket creation
This ensures complex issues get proper attention
demoScriptParts.screenInteraction: I'll continue typing to show the transition
keywords: recognizes when automated solutions aren't working
demoScriptParts.nextAction: Type: That didn't work → Still doesn't work → Not resolved

demoScriptParts.title: Scenario C: Lab Crash - Ticket Details Request
scriptBullets: Watch the AI agent autonomously create a detailed ticket
It's analyzing the issue, classifying priority, and generating the ticket automatically
All without human intervention
The ticket is enriched with full context from the conversation
demoScriptParts.screenInteraction: I'll provide more details to trigger ticket creation
demoScriptParts.nextAction: Type detailed message about the crash
copyableTexts: The lab environment crashed and won't restart. I've tried rebooting the VM but it's still not responding.

demoScriptParts.title: Scenario C: Lab Crash - Ticket Creation
scriptBullets: Notice the processing animation showing the AI at work
It's analyzing, classifying priority, and generating the ticket
This happens automatically without human intervention
The ticket is now in the system ready for agent review
demoScriptParts.screenInteraction: Watch as the system detects urgency and escalates

demoScriptParts.title: Scenario C: Lab Crash - Escalation Trigger
scriptBullets: Our AI detects urgency through sentiment analysis
It immediately escalates to Tier 2 support
Sarah, our support agent, is now connected with full context
She knows exactly what the user needs without re-explaining
demoScriptParts.screenInteraction: Let me type an urgent message to trigger the escalation
demoScriptParts.nextAction: Type: I need help NOW! This is urgent!
copyableTexts: I need help NOW! This is urgent!

demoScriptParts.title: Scenario C: Lab Crash - Agent Appears
demoScriptParts.keyMessage: Human agent takes over with context
scriptBullets: Notice Sarah, our Tier 2 support agent, appears with full conversation context
She knows exactly what happened and can help immediately
No need for the user to repeat their issue
The handoff is seamless and efficient
demoScriptParts.screenInteraction: Now let's look at how agents manage these tickets in the dashboard

demoScriptParts.title: Role-Based Access Control - Switch Roles
demoScriptParts.keyMessage: Demonstrate different roles have different access
scriptBullets: Notice the navigation tabs available to a Cyber Operator
Different roles see different screens based on their responsibilities
Let me switch to another role to show how the interface changes
This ensures users only see what they need for their job
demoScriptParts.screenInteraction: I'll log out and switch to a Help Desk Analyst role
demoScriptParts.nextAction: Click logout or navigate to login
demoScriptParts.clickTarget: Logout button or back to login

demoScriptParts.title: Login as Help Desk Analyst
scriptBullets: Now I'm logging in as Alex Analyst, a Help Desk Analyst
This role manages support tickets and monitors AI performance
They have access to ticket management and analytics
But they don't have access to configuration or system administration
demoScriptParts.screenInteraction: Let me click on Alex Analyst to log in

demoScriptParts.title: Analyst Dashboard - Different View
scriptBullets: Notice the analyst sees a different dashboard focused on ticket management
The navigation shows only the screens relevant to their role
No configuration or system integration tabs - those are admin-only
The analyst can focus on resolving tickets and monitoring performance
demoScriptParts.screenInteraction: Let me show you the ticket management view for analysts

demoScriptParts.title: Screen 2: Ticket Dashboard
demoScriptParts.keyMessage: Show ticket management and AI insights
scriptBullets: Here's where your support team manages escalated tickets
Notice the ticket we just created appears automatically with full context
The dashboard shows priority levels, status, and AI-generated summaries
These summaries save agents 40% time on documentation
You can see AI confidence scores, suggested resolutions, and escalation paths
The system learns from every interaction to improve future responses
demoScriptParts.screenInteraction: Let me click on the ticket to show the full details and AI insights

demoScriptParts.title: Screen 3: Analytics Dashboard
scriptBullets: This is your command center for performance insights
We track resolution times, user satisfaction, and AI accuracy rates
Notice how 59.5% of issues are resolved instantly by AI
The remaining 40.5% get intelligent escalation to human agents
Our customers see 30% faster response times
And 25% improvement in user retention
The system continuously monitors for patterns and suggests KB improvements
demoScriptParts.screenInteraction: Let me navigate to the Configuration screen to show how you control the AI behavior
keywords: 59.5% of issues are resolved instantly by AI

demoScriptParts.title: Login as Administrator
scriptBullets: Now let me switch to Adam Admin, our system administrator
Administrators have full access to all screens and settings
They manage configuration, integrations, security, and compliance
They can see everything and control the entire system
demoScriptParts.screenInteraction: I'll log out and switch to the admin role
demoScriptParts.nextAction: Click logout and select Adam Admin
demoScriptParts.clickTarget: Logout button, then Adam Admin card

demoScriptParts.title: Screen 4: Configuration Interface
scriptBullets: Administrators can easily configure AI behavior, knowledge sources, and escalation rules
You control confidence thresholds, response templates, and integration settings
All without any coding - just point and click
You can adjust sentiment sensitivity for different scenarios
Customize disambiguation flows for your specific workflows
Manage role-based access for different team members
All while maintaining CUI compliance
demoScriptParts.screenInteraction: Now let me show you the Knowledge Base management where we control the AI's knowledge

demoScriptParts.title: Screen 5: Knowledge Base Management
scriptBullets: This is where administrators manage the knowledge base that powers the AI
You can upload articles from Confluence, MKDocs, or Jira
The system automatically indexes them for AI search and retrieval
Notice the upload status, article count, and sync history
The KB is the foundation of AI accuracy
Better articles mean better responses
You can see which articles are being used most frequently
demoScriptParts.screenInteraction: Let me show you the escalation workflow to explain how tickets flow through the system
keywords: upload articles from Confluence, MKDocs, or Jira

demoScriptParts.title: Screen 6: Escalation Workflow
scriptBullets: This shows the intelligent escalation paths we just saw in action
Tickets flow from AI to Tier 1 to Tier 2 based on complexity and urgency
Each step maintains full conversation context
Agents never lose information during handoffs
The system tracks SLAs and ensures timely resolution
demoScriptParts.screenInteraction: Now let me show you the system integration dashboard
keywords: Tickets flow from AI to Tier 1 to Tier 2

demoScriptParts.title: Screen 7: System Integration Status
scriptBullets: Real-time monitoring of all connected systems
We integrate with Confluence, Jira, your authentication systems, and external knowledge bases
Health checks ensure everything is working smoothly
You can see the status of each integration at a glance
Alerts notify you of any issues immediately
The system automatically syncs data across platforms
demoScriptParts.screenInteraction: Finally, let me show you the Security & Compliance dashboard
keywords: Real-time monitoring of all connected systems
Health checks ensure everything is working smoothly

demoScriptParts.title: Screen 8: Security & Compliance
demoScriptParts.keyMessage: Show CUI compliance and continuous learning
scriptBullets: Our continuous learning system improves the AI over time
It retrains on new data to stay current with your environment
We maintain full audit trails for compliance
CUI protection is built into every layer
All user interactions are secure in a Controlled Unclassified Environment
You have complete visibility into what the AI is learning
Regular compliance reports are automatically generated
demoScriptParts.screenInteraction: Let me wrap up with a summary of the transformation

demoScriptParts.title: Closing Statement
scriptBullets: What you've seen is a complete transformation of help desk experience
From instant self-service to intelligent escalation
All while maintaining security compliance
Integrating seamlessly with your existing PCTE infrastructure
This reduces resolution time by over 70%
While improving user satisfaction
Your team can focus on complex issues while AI handles routine requests
The system continuously learns and improves
demoScriptParts.screenInteraction: Thank you for walking through the demo. Do you have any questions?
keywords: complete transformation of help desk experience
